text: Dieter Kottysch (30 June 1943 - 9 April 2017) was a German amateur middleweight boxer. He was born in Gliwice, Poland. He competed in the 1968 and 1972 Olympics and won a gold medal in 1972. He was a member of BC Sportmann, Hamburg. Kottysch died on 9 April 2017 in Hamburg, Germany from a long-illness at the age of 73.Dieter Kottysch's obituary ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1943 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German boxers Category:Disease-related deaths in Germany Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany Category:People from former German territories
title: Dieter Kottysch
